body_html: Yes, setting ctx.input_device also should have propagated 0 as the root value for nccl call. You should still be able to assign your model to arbitrary device, 0 is not device id, it is the 0-th element of the device_id list that was used to create nccl communicator, which corresponds to device 1 in your case.
